name: Power Cookies
author: Healthy
summary: These are high fiber, high protein, low in fat and absolutely delicious cookies that make a terrific snack.  You won't believe how good they are! Any dried fruit or nuts are recommended as additions to this recipe.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grind the oats in a blender until resembling coarse flour
In a medium bowl, mash beans to a smooth paste
Stir in the white sugar, brown sugar and vanilla until well blended
Combine the ground oats, baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon; blend into the bean mixture
Stir in the dates, coconut, raisins and walnuts
Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden
Cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes then remove to wire racks to cool completely
